description:
🎃 PUMPKINHEAD – Official Trailer (2025) | R. L. Stine Halloween  
Fear wears a mask… and it’s made of pumpkin. Pumpkinhead is the chilling new Halloween horror by R. L. Stine — nightmare incarnate, creeping into your darkest corners just in time for October.

Film Overview
In a small, cursed town, children go missing each autumn. When siblings Lucy and Jake unearth the legend of Pumpkinhead — a creature summoned by vengeance — their curiosity becomes terror. As darkness falls, they must run, hide, and fight an unrelenting monster born from ancient grudges.

A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.
- The audio claims for our promotional features are getting out of hand.

PUMPKINHEAD Official Trailer (2025) R. L. Stine - New Halloween Movies 4K
Enjoy advanced 4K Upscaling and HDR-10 mastering across future trailers. Stay tuned for more.
